author: Blake Lowry
comment: Unfortunately while I learned metric in school its simply not second nature like imperial.  I have to look up and convert each weight which makes having this on my watch pointless.
title: Unusable For Us Metric-Tards

author: Stephen Thomas
comment: What a great app, works perfect on moto 360 and note 3 easy and accurate to use. Have tried a few apps now but this is by far the best, and less complicated to use. A print or email workout option is all that's missing. Well done.
title: Musclewear

author: Darren Gill
comment: Really needs to buzz when rest period is finished then would give 5 stars
title: Good app

author: Alex Toyos
comment: Much needed app but needs the option to change to lbs
title: Needs lbs

author: Pano 360
comment: It's a good app, simple to use and effective.
title: It's not bad

author: shuggibear
comment: I've been waiting for an app exactly like this since I got my wear. I've plugged in my workout from today to get a feel for it and I love it. The only thing is, I know most weights are marked for KG and LBS, but could you include a setting option for that? Thanks for the awesome app and I'll be sending more feedback to the email listed as I use it more.
title: Can't wait to fully implement this

author: John O'Brien
comment: Worked great for the first six workouts, then wear device stopped syncing and recording workouts on phone.
title: A great app, but...

author: Mike Franks
comment: Would love this app, if it had the ability to switch to Pounds vs Kilo.
